subject: Greetings From Desk of the P
body:
Greetings From Desk of the President World Bank Group
Dear Email Owner,This is to acknowledge the receipt of your message. World
Bank Organization is eradicating poverty
in America, Asia, Europe, Oceania, Russia and your name was among the 3
Lucky people listed. Your ATM VISA CARD of ($3.2M USD) was registered
with U.P.S company Delivery service. You will receive it within 72hours.Your
ATM VISA CARD will be handed over to you in person at the address you will
provide below. Note, that ATM VISA CARD must get to your address within 72
hours once you reconfirm your receiving addresses demanded below. CONFIRM
YOUR DELIVERY ADDRESS BELOW AND LET US KNOW IF THERE IS ANY
CHANGE
RECEIVER'S NAME:___________
DELIVERY ADDRESS:___________
DIRECT CELL NUMBER:___________
COUNTRY:___________
OCCUPATION:___________
E-MAIL:___________
SEX:___________
Ask him how you can get your ATM CARD of (US$3.200,000.00.)
CONTACT PERSON: 
kimd25099@gmail.com
U.P.S company Office
Contact Person: Dr. Chris Johnson
Note:  I have paid for the
Insurance & Delivery fee. The only fee you have to pay is their Security fee
($150.00 dollars) through remitly MTN mobile money with this phone number
+22996663323 or you can buy apple gift card or steam wallet card, Please
indicate the Code (CNK463) and ask Him how to pay their Security fee so
that you can pay it immediately.
YOUR SWIFT RESPOND ARE HIGHLY
APPRECIATED
WORLD BANK GROUP From Desk of the President World Bank Group

subject: Re:   Greetings From Desk of the P
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me from the World Bank Group. I appreciate your message and would like to know more about how I can receive my ATM VISA CARD of USD. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. How do I confirm my delivery address? Is there a specific form or process I need to follow?
2. Can you please explain what the Security fee is for? Why is it necessary?
3. What are the payment options available for the Security fee? Can I pay through a bank transfer or credit card?
4. Are there any other fees or charges that I should be aware of before receiving my ATM VISA CARD?

I look forward to your swift response.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth
